about_the_game:
Welcome to Dominay a competitive game in a fantasy world where you will become a great master of powerful weapons and spells. If you are a player who likes a PvP you can score for your team by fighting enemy players, but if you prefer a PvE you can score for your team by fulfilling challenges scattered in the forest, you decide.

ADVANTAGE

In each game you can choose your advantage. Each has a unique power that determines what type of player you will be.

WEAPONS

Weapons are your most important skills, you can find them in chests. Each weapon has a different style for you.

ITEMS

It's important that you know the forest well, because the more you explore the map, the more items you'll find that will help you in the battles that await you in the forest.

CHALLENGES

To win the game in Dominay, you'll be able to complete challenges against the opposing team around the map. For each of these tasks, your team will receive a score.

name: Dominay

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: win 7,8,9
  • Processor: Intel: Core i3-530 ou AMD: A6-3650
  • Graphics: NVidia: GeForce 9600GT ou AMD: HD 6570
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: Intel: Core i5-3300 ou AMD: Ryzen 3 1200
  • Graphics: NVidia: GeForce 560 ou AMD: Radeon HD 6950
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

supported_languages:
Portuguese - Brazil*, English*, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
